https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/XMcAWcq2fwM9NfO2otW9nRjqkh.jpg In the small local school of Cheratte, a former mining town, 11-year old students with and immigrant background are coming to the end of their primary school education with Brigitte. She is a dynamic teacher whose particular pedagogical approach aims to give these pupils a firm foundation to build on in this constantly changing world. Children of Chance
